title: FOL (song)
text:
"FOL" is a song by <a href="The%20Smashing%20Pumpkins">The Smashing Pumpkins</a>, written and recorded during the sessions for their 2007 album "<a href="Zeitgeist%20%28The%20Smashing%20Pumpkins%20album%29">Zeitgeist</a>" and used for a <a href="Hyundai%20Motor%20Company">Hyundai</a> commercial during <a href="Super%20Bowl%20XLIII">Super Bowl XLIII</a>. The song title is an acronym that stands for "Feel Our Love".
The song was first announced by Hyundai for their <a href="Hyundai%20Genesis%20Coupe">Genesis Coupe</a> Super Bowl commercial, debuting on February 1, in which <a href="Billy%20Corgan">Billy Corgan</a> mixed Hyundai clips going to the beat of the song. On that same day, the song was released as a free download from the Hyundai website.
It was the theme song for <a href="Total%20Nonstop%20Action%20Wrestling">TNA Wrestling</a>'s premiere event of the year, <a href="Bound%20for%20Glory%20%282010%29">Bound for Glory 2010</a>.
